text: aur hamane nirdesh diya manushy ko apane maata-pita ke saath upakaar karane[1] ka aur yadi donon dabaav daalen tumapar ki tum saajhee banao mere saath us cheez ko, jisaka tumako gyaan nahin, to un donon kee baat na maano.[2] meree or hee tumhen phirakar aana hai, phir main tumhen soochit kar doonga us karm se, jo tum karate rahe ho
